<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8"/>

    <title>{{ opts$params$title }}</title>

    {{ get_assets(opts) }}

  </head>

  <body>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    ```{r engine="coffee", results="asis", echo = FALSE }

    data = {{ get_data_as_json(opts) }}

    radius = {{ opts$params$radius }}

    color_scale = {{ get_d3_color_scale(opts) }}

    color_legend_counts = {{ get_color_legend_counts(opts) }}

    plot = new_plot(
        width: {{ opts$params$width }}
        height: {{ opts$params$height }}
        padding: {{ get_padding_param(opts) }}
        data: {{ toJSON(opts$data )}}
        xlab: "{{ opts$params$xlab }}"
        ylab: "{{ opts$params$ylab }}"
        title: "{{ opts$params$title }}"
        box: {{ toJSON(opts$data$box )}}
        xlim: {{ toJSON(opts$params$xlim )}}
        ylim: {{ toJSON(opts$params$ylim )}}
        jitter: {{ opts$params$jitter }}
        ordinal_scale_padding: 1
        linear_scale_padding: 40)

    plot.tooltip_text = (d) ->
        "<strong>#{d.point_name}</strong><br>
        #{plot.ylab}: <strong>#{format_property(d.y)}</strong><br>
        #{plot.xlab}: #{format_property(d.x)}"

    plot.append("defs").append("clipPath")
        .attr("id", "clip")
      .append("rect")
        .attr(
            "width": plot.width
            "height": plot.height)

    clip = plot.append("g")
        .attr("clip-path", "url(#clip)")

    if plot.zoom
        clip.append("rect")
          .attr(
                "class": "overlay"
                "width":  plot.width
                "height": plot.height
                "fill": "none"
                "pointer-events": "all")
          .style("cursor","move")
          .call(d3.behavior.zoom()
              .x(plot.scales.x)
              .y(plot.scales.y)
              .scaleExtent([1, Infinity])
              .on("zoom", () -> redraw() ))

        transform = (d) ->
            "translate(#{plot.scales.x(d.x)},#{plot.scales.y(d.y)})"

        redraw = () ->
            plot.select(".x.axis").call(plot.axes.x);
            plot.select(".y.axis").call(plot.axes.y);
            g_points.attr("transform", transform)

    g_points = clip.selectAll(".point")
        .data(data)
      .enter().append("g")
        .attr(
              "class": "point"
              "transform": (d) -> "translate(#{plot.scales.x(d.x) + plot.jitters.x * random()}, #{plot.scales.y(d.y) + plot.jitters.y * random()})")


    points = g_points.append("svg:circle")
        .attr(
            "class": "circle_tooltip"
            "r": radius
            "fill": (d) -> color_scale(d.colorize)
            "title": (d) -> plot.tooltip_text(d) )

    $(".circle_tooltip").tooltip
        html: true
        container: "body"
        placement: "top"

    point_names = g_points.append("text")
        .text((d) -> d.point_name)
        .attr(
            "dy": ".32em"
            "dx": 8
            "text-anchor": "left"
            "display": "none")
        .style(
            "fill": (d) -> color_scale(d.colorize)
            "font-size": "22px")

    # if plot.zoom
        # g_points.attr("transform": transform)


        # point_names.attr(
        #     "x": (d,i)-> plot.jitters.x[i]
        #     "y": (d,i)-> plot.jitters.y[i])

    # Sidebar
    sidebar = plot.append("g")
        .attr("transform","translate(#{plot.width + 60},#{0})")

    g_toggle_names = sidebar.append("g")
        .style("cursor", "pointer")
        .style("font-size","22px")
        .on("click", () -> toggle_names())

    g_toggle_names.append("circle")
        .attr("r", 7)
        .attr("stroke","black")
        .attr("stroke-width", 2)
        .attr("fill","white")

    g_toggle_names.append("text")
        .attr('text-anchor', 'start')
        .attr('dy', '.32em')
        .attr('dx', '12')
        .text("Show names (#{data.length})")

    toggle_names = ()->
        showing_point_names = g_toggle_names.classed("show_names")
        point_names.attr("display", ()->        if showing_point_names then "none" else "inline")
        g_toggle_names.attr("class", ()->        if showing_point_names then "" else "show_names")
            .select("circle").attr("fill", ()-> if showing_point_names then "white" else "black")

    # Draw color legend
    if color_scale.range().length > 1
        sidebar.append("text")
            .attr(
                  "class": "colorize_title"
                  "x": 0
                  "y": 35
                  "dy": ".35em")
            .style(
                  "font-size": "24px")
            .text("{{ opts$params$colorize_title }}")

        g_color_legend = sidebar.selectAll(".key")
            .data(color_scale.domain().reverse())
          .enter().append("g")
            .attr(
                  "transform": (d, i) -> "translate(0, #{i * (radius * 2 + 15) + 50})"
                  "class": "key")

        g_color_legend.append("circle")
            .attr(
                "r": radius
                "fill": color_scale)

        # legend_point_names = get_legend_names_param(opts)
        g_color_legend.append("text")
            .attr(
                "x": radius + 10
                "y": 0
                "dy": ".35em")
            .text((d) -> "#{d} (#{color_legend_counts[d]})")
            # ).text((d,i) -> legend_names[i])


    # d3.select(window).on("keydown", () ->
    #     # switch (d3.event.keyCode) {
    #       # case : year = Math.max(year0, year - 10); break;
    #       # case 39: year = Math.min(year1, year + 10); break;
    #     # }
    #     # console.log(d3.event.keyCode)
    #     if (d3.event.keyCode in [78, 32]) # 'n' or 'space bar'
    #         change()
    # )

    ```
    </script>
    <div class = "code">
    {{ opts$params$code }}
    </div>
  </body>
</html>
